name: Growthcurve
slogan: Advertising is dead - we're what comes next
description:
We create next-generation marketing campaigns that fuse technology, data and design.

We're an elite team of creatives, engineers, hackers and quants - changing the way tech companies grow.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: PPC Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a superstar Performance Marketing Manager to join our elite team of creatives, engineers, hackers and quants - changing the way tech companies grow.

Working directly with our CEO, you will be responsible for the campaign research, media planning and buying and the day-to-day running of the campaigns. You’ll need to be someone who is willing to learn and implement new innovative ways to reach audiences and have the technical prowess to execute. 

**Please only apply if you have at least 2 years Facebook Ads platform experience. This is a very hands-on role.**

Joining Growthcurve is a fantastic opportunity to be a part of a well-respected, well-connected, and fun growth agency. We value hard work and talent, if you have the chops you’ll be rewarded handsomely. You’ll have the chance to really make a difference, get noticed and progress quickly within the organisation if you can prove you have the skill, drive and motivation to deliver results.

Working alongside the CEO you will:

* Create substantial campaign strategies driven by data-backed research.
* Plan, execute manage and optimise paid search and paid social campaigns,
* Track, analyse and report on campaign performance.
* Manage budgets of £50k+ monthly spends
* Drive continued innovation and best practice implementation.
* Help direct and manage the development of optimised campaign landing pages.
* Seek to continually improve campaign performance through iterative testing (A/B and Multivariate).
